channel.title: Muon on Franz Louis Cesista
channel.description: Recent content in Muon on Franz Louis Cesista

item.title: Steepest Descent Under Schatten-p Norms
item.description: Simply switching to Muon can already get you 2x efficiency gains. But you can squeeze out an extra 1-2% by optimizing the Newton-Schulz coefficients.

item.title: Squeezing 1-2% Efficiency Gains Out of Muon by Optimizing the Newton-Schulz Coefficients
item.description: Simply switching to Muon can already get you 2x efficiency gains. But you can squeeze out an extra 1-2% by optimizing the Newton-Schulz coefficients.

item.title: CASPR Without Accumulation is Muon
item.description: The CASPR optimizer, a variant of Shampoo, reduces to Muon when we remove the accumulation on the preconditioners.
